description: This Java source file defines the IntegerIPC class, which implements the ObjectIPC interface for handling simple Integer values with JSON serialization and deserialization methods.

classes.name: IntegerIPC
classes.description: A class representing an IPC object encapsulating an integer value, capable of converting to and from JSON format.

methods.name: IntegerIPC
methods.description: Constructor to initialize with a specific integer value.

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: Converts this object to a JSON object.

methods.name: fromJSON
methods.description: Parses a JSON object to set the internal value.
